headline: Delta Air Lines, Inc. (DAL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Delta Air Lines, Inc. on Investing With Purpose’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DAL. Delta Air Lines, Inc.’s share was trading at $59.47 as of September 18th. DAL’s trailing and forward P/E were 8.55 and 8.11 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Delta Air Lines […]
